summary: The code defines a module for handling WAV audio files. It imports necessary libraries and sets up constants for PCM format and extensible format. It defines a named tuple `_wave_params` to store audio parameters such as channels, sample width, frame rate, number of frames, compression type, and compression name. The `Wave_read` class's `__init__` method initializes a file object (if a string path  )  )  )  ... etc...
